nodes.text: Andel was the male captain and leader of a small pirate gang operating in the Shelsha sector. The BloodScar-pirate, Caaldra, was disposed to recruiting Andel's group and propositioned him to join. Captain Andel was not inclined to join Caaldra's organization, but told him that he would consider the business and give his answer in a week's time. However, he was killed during a skirmish involving the Millennium Falcon and the Hand of Judgment.
